description:
Sign bath by making a fist out of your two hands with your thumbs sticking out, then moving the fists vertically up and down your chest. The sign looks a lot like someone scrubbing themselves with both hands, as if taking a very efficient bath. Just imagine you were married to an engineer, and they wanted to bathe with maximal efficiency!
The fist form in the sign for bath is actually the letter A sign in American Sign Language.
